titleStmt.title: A sermon of loue Instructing all men to vnite and ioyne themselues in hearty loue, and Christian charitie with one another. Preached at Folkestone, a maior towne in Kent. By Francis Rogers, Batchelor in Diuinity; and sometimes fellow of Trinitie Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Francis, d. 1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. S[nodham] for George Norton, dwelling neare Temple-barre,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
